Detailed Description

A subclass of DialogBox that can display one, two or three buttons.

If you only want to display a String in this dialog box, use the setMessage() method.

The following example demonstrates how to use the AlertBox. 

  //Create your AlertBox in your page
  SamplePage : public Page {
    public:
      AlertBox* mpAlert;
      SamplePage();
      virtual ~SamplePage();
      virtual void onInit(Persistence* p);
      virtual void onTear();
      void createAlertBox();
  };

  void SamplePage::createAlertBox() {
      mpAlert = new AlertBox(this);
      if (mpAlert != NULL) {
          //set AlertDialog cancelable
          mpAlert->setCancelable(true);
          //set AlertBox Message
          mpAlert->setMessage(gaia::base::String("Alert Dialog Title"));
          //set AlertBox Title
          mpAlert->setTitle(gaia::base::String("Alert Dialog Title"));
          //Enable AlertBox Button without button clicked listener
          mpAlert->enableButton(AlertBox::BUTTON_POSITIVE, gaia::base::String("OK"), NULL);

          //showing AlertBox
          Scene* scene = getSceneSingleton();
          if (scene != NULL) {
              scene->showDialog(mpAlert);
          }
      }
  }

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::ui::AlertBox::Button_ID

Used to define the Button Position on AlertBox.

Enumerator:
BUTTON_POSITIVE 

The identifier for the positive button.

BUTTON_NEGATIVE 

The identifier for the negative button.

BUTTON_NEUTRAL 

The identifier for the neutral button.

void gaia::ui::AlertBox::disableDismiss ( bool  diable)

Disable/Enable default dismiss behavior when click button which only could be BUTTON_POSITIVE, BUTTON_NEGATIVE or BUTTON_NEUTRAL.

This function could be workable before DialogBox::setupBox called.

Parameters:
disableWhether enable default dismiss behavior or not, default is false.

const gaia::base::String &  text,
const IDialogOnClickListener *  listener 
)

AlertBox have at most three button.

It could configure to enable the Button and show the corresponding string on it.

Parameters:

textIndicates the Button text would like to display.
listenerNotified when button is clicked.

void gaia::ui::AlertBox::setMultiChoiceItems ( int32_t  itemsId,
const bool  checkedItems[],
int32_t  count,
const IDialogOnMultiChoiceClickListener *  listener 
)

Set a list of items to be displayed in the AlertBox as the content, you will be notified of the selected item via the supplied listener.

The list will have a check mark displayed to the right of the text for each checked item. Clicking on an item in the list will not dismiss the AlertBox. Clicking on a button will dismiss the AlertBox.

Parameters:
itemsIdThe resource id of an array i.e. R::array::foo
checkedItemsSpecifies which items are checked. It should be null in which case no items are checked. If non null it must be exactly the same length as the array of items.
countThe size of array checkedItems.
listenerNotified when an item on the list is clicked. The AlertBox will not be dismissed when an item is clicked. It will only be dismissed if clicked on a button, if no buttons are supplied it's up to the user to dismiss the AlertBox.
void gaia::ui::AlertBox::setMultiChoiceItems ( const gaia::base::StringArray &  items,
const bool  checkedItems[],
const IDialogOnMultiChoiceClickListener *  listener 
)

Set a list of items to be displayed in the AlertBox as the content, you will be notified of the selected item via the supplied listener.

The list will have a check mark displayed to the right of the text for each checked item. Clicking on an item in the list will not dismiss the AlertBox. Clicking on a button will dismiss the AlertBox.

Parameters:
itemsA string-array for multi choice list item display.
checkedItemsSpecifies which items are checked. It should be null in which case no items are checked. If non null it must be exactly the same length as the array of items.
listenerNotified when an item on the list is clicked. The AlertBox will not be dismissed when an item is clicked. It will only be dismissed if clicked on a button, if no buttons are supplied it's up to the user to dismiss the AlertBox.
void gaia::ui::AlertBox::setMultiChoiceItems ( const gaia::storage::Cursor &  cursor,
const gaia::base::String &  isCheckedColumn,
const gaia::base::String &  labelColumn,
const IDialogOnMultiChoiceClickListener *  listener 
)

Set a list of items to be displayed in the AlertBox as the content, you will be notified of the selected item via the supplied listener.

The list will have a check mark displayed to the right of the text for each checked item. Clicking on an item in the list will not dismiss the AlertBox. Clicking on a button will dismiss the AlertBox.

Parameters:
cursorThe cursor used to provide the items.
isCheckedColumnSpecifies the column name on the cursor to determine whether a checkbox is checked or not.
labelColumnThe column name on the cursor which contains the string to display in the label.
listenerNotified when an item on the list is clicked. The AlertBox will not be dismissed when an item is clicked. It will only be dismissed if clicked on a button, if no buttons are supplied it's up to the user to dismiss the AlertBox.

bool  defaultPadding = 0,
int32_t  top = 0,
int32_t  down = 0 
)

Swallow the customized content ui to AlertBox.

Parameters:
widgetThe customized ui that would show in the center of AlertBox.
defaultPaddingIf false the customized ui locate on center of AlertBox else the customized ui locate on the customized position.
topExtra space to appear above customized ui.
downExtra space to appear below customized ui.
